title: Very Difficult to Use and Test
body:
Ever since I downloaded the client, I was very excited to play on it than the current one because it was really beautiful and has lots to offer. I haven't touched it when I downloaded it because my computer can't handle all of the visual quality it has. Just today I tried it because I was curious on how it's doing. I tried Draft Mode and I wasn't even able to pick my Champion or change my Masteries. So i was forced to dodge cause I didn't want to be at a disadvantage or waste the other players time. The client lags so much that it costs me 10 seconds for each click I do. Champion, Mastery, Rune, etc. That gives me VERY little time to figure out what/how I'm going to play.

I don't have the best computer there is. I feel like players that have top-notch computers can only play on the Alpha Client. I Hope soon that the client doesn't use so much resources in order to run smoothly. I even checked the "Disable Animation" box to see if that would help, but the animations are still there and it didn't do much to help.

I love the client. I really do. But I just can't play it until it works very well for, not only for me, ALL players that don't have top-notch computers. Continue on making the Client better and I hope I can play on it soon.

replies.body: We know that performance is an important issue and we're continually trying to improve it as we go along to get better and better. Thanks for the feedback and please let us know if you continue having the same issue in the future!

What are your computer specs?
There is a disable animations feature in the settings button but i don't know how much this will help.
